title: Match font from flash template
content:
Hi all,

I have a font from a flash template that I purchased, but the type is in image form so I can’t see what font is actually used. I am posting an image of the menu bar to see if anyone can help me identify it.

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121233909im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/font_5222.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Sans in Timothy Leary quote on Superfamous.com - Antenna {Mike Y}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121233909/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48968 "Go to previous forum topic") [UPSCENE! logo font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121233909/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48982 "Go to next forum topic")
author: nailzfan

comments.content:
It’s very similar to [Newport](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121233909/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/newport-classic-sg/), but modified - the bar of the H has been raised, and the U is squared. And no wonder you need the font, the word “SHEDULE” is misspelled!

If you want something with a similar flavor but actually good, take a look at [Mostra](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121233909/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/mostra/).
